forumInfoPopup.title: Types of Discussion Forum
forumInfoPopup.standardDiscussionInfo: This is a generic discussion forum where a topic will be given, and learners start discussing on that by starting a thread and replying to it.
forumInfoPopup.doubtClarificationInfo: This is used as a holding entity for the Q&A of Contents. For example, If this is created at a Unit level then It will hold the Q&A related to all the contents under it.
